name: Drailand
description:
Controls

WASD/IJKL: Move

Space: Jump

Escape (hold): Back to main manu

Mouse: look around

Description

Game developed during the Udemy course https://www.udemy.com/course-dashboard-redirect/?course_id=1910458

Gather the hammer collectibles in the level before time runs out or the thing catches you. Press the door open button and go through the gate to finish it.

Playtime: around 15 minutes.

Distributions

Windows 10
